Author: invincibletitan33
Text: Purging is only a temporary fix, please don't fall down that rabbit hole. ðŸ’• Drink some peppermint tea, it will soothe your stomach, try and go for a walk or gentle swim, maybe distract yourself with a new tv show or movie, and take a nap. I promise you'll feel better, and tomorrow is a new day. We've all been there, don't beat yourself up.
